title: The Importance Of NFTs
body:
### INVESTING

# The Importance Of NFTs In The Cryptocurrency World

Non-fungible tokens are increasingly becoming popular. These devices have proven an excellent digital solution for collectibles. Usually, they reflect various real-world elements, including music, art, movies, and in-game items. These cryptographic tokens cannot be replicated, nor can they be exchanged at equivalency. Yet, you can rely on them for various transactions, mainly when selling digital art and currencies. The following are the benefits NFTs offer to the cryptocurrency sphere.

### Enhanced Authenticity

The Blockchain is an integral element in the [production of NFTs](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/blockchain-games-nfts-integral-part-153545092.html), meaning they are significantly unique. Usually, blockchain technology translates to specific data being used. Thanks to these distinct characteristics, you can be sure of improved value addition. In addition, the creators of NFTs restrict their production, creating a supply scarcity.

NFTs enjoy enhanced immutability, which enhances their legitimacy. Blockchain technology ensures that they remain unaffected by removal, replacement, or changes.

### Ability to Prove Ownership

You can prove ownership of non-fungible tokens effortlessly. That is because they are stored on a specific blockchain network. They come with non-distributable properties, meaning that consumers are protected against the risk of getting counterfeit digital assets.

In addition, rigorous steps go into determining ownership of whatever NFT you have. The technology used requires that you prove you own the real thing, assuring you of possession overvalue. Ideally, NFTs make it easier to establish and manage the ownership of assets.

### Unrivaled Marketplace Efficiency

NFTs are designed to improve [marketplace](https://hbr.org/2021/11/making-sense-of-the-nft-marketplace) efficiencies, including when handling cryptocurrencies. Ideally, these devices allow you to convert physical assets into digital ones, eliminating intermediaries and improving supply chains.

You’ll also be better placed to connect with crypto buyers or sellers effortlessly. Eliminating intermediaries minimizes costs and cumbersomeness. Since you will connect with the buyers and sellers directly, there will be no agency fees. For example, no agent comes in when doing a USD coin exchange on [Rubix](https://rubix.io/about). You could also rely on NFTs to manage sensitive data about your cryptocurrency.

### They Fractionalize Asset Ownership

Suppose you have one cryptocurrency token and you’d like to sell part of it only. In this case,  it would be best to rely on NFTs, which allow you to divide them into smaller assets. You could also use this approach when handling physical assets. The idea is to digitize the value of your asset, whether digital or physical, and divide it into shareable versions.

At the same time, these NFTs are transferable. This element allows you to trade NFTs freely across various markets. You can transfer ownership through smart contracts, an aspect of blockchain gaining significant popularity. However, this transfer will only suffice after the buyer and seller meet specific conditions. However, you cannot break NFTs into smaller denominations.

### Security

Everyone looks forward to the enhanced security of their digital assets. Thankfully, NFTs provide unmatched safety and security. Thanks to blockchain, you are confident of protection against fraud in the long run.

### Enhance Inclusivity

While cryptocurrency aims at improving inclusivity, this goal is yet to be fully met. These NFTs bring creators and traders from different fields into a single ecosystem. Having a similar pool allows the creators to enjoy excellent value for their creations. It also enables these creators to transact using cryptocurrency effortlessly.

NFTs afford buyers access to different forms of digitized assets, particularly cryptocurrencies. Owning these assets provides enough flexibility for growth. At the same time, NFT allows multiple buyers to have a stake in a single entity. Shared ownership is vital, mainly because of the increased value of cryptocurrencies.

In conclusion, NFTs are unique and digitally scarce resources that have proven helpful in the cryptocurrency world. These devices allow you to manage and transact your cryptocurrency.

title: Governance Principles for DAOs
body:
### Governance is everywhere

Governance is everywhere around us. Whether it is within a family unit, football team, a multinational corporation, or a local market, every group uses governance in some form for its operations. Coordination at scale requires governance and transparent processes.

Most teams that are formed have informal or undocumented governance structures. For example, a youth football club has a manager and 15 players. The manager, in this example, is the decision-maker and he must govern the team. He decides that practice must be attended for players to be eligible to play in the weekend’s games. So here we have a governance rule for the football squad: All individuals know that to play in Saturday’s match, each player must be present at practice. This is a simple governance rule, but important nonetheless as it sets guidance on how an organization is to function. Governance sets parameters on the system and helps a team coordinate.

The most common organizational structure for companies at scale has been a hierarchical approach (see diagram below). This has many benefits as decision-making centralizes at specific nodes for efficiency. However, a common criticism is that it can lead to a lack of transparency and incomplete information in decision-making. This drawback can be extremely detrimental to a group’s or company’s success as relevant stakeholders are not consulted for a particular decision.

![Traditional organization hierarchy](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZT46WtPawmZVghWnTy4Sh.png?height=264&width=936)

Cryptographic tools and new governance interfaces have the opportunity to help DAOs and teams construct new team voting structures that allow for broader participation of relevant parties while maintaining focus on company or project timelines. Further DAO tooling and DAO examples can be researched at [Aragon](https://aragon.org/), [Syndicate DAO](https://syndicate.io/), [Orca Protocol](https://www.orcaprotocol.org/), and [MolochDAO](https://molochdao.com/).

### Governance in Action

Governance spans all parts of an organization: business processes, hiring decisions, and project charters. Governance gives structure to how people, teams, or organizations interact and move forward with decisions. If there was no governance or guidelines, organizations run into issues where people are making decisions without regard to other relevant parties or groups. Without governance, inefficiencies become exacerbated when organizations look to scale because teams or people begin working in different ways, which might not be aligned with the overall mission of the DAO or organization. Templates and standardized processes with a clear governing team will contribute greatly to a team’s ability to scale processes beyond the original team or cohort.

All that said, governance is a living organism. Governance models ought to be structured so they can change as the environment around them changes. It’s important that processes are not so ridge that they become ossified, but not too flexible that they are changed too quickly. Governance changes ought to have a documented change process. Governance is somewhat recursive. Just as democratic governments have numerous checks and balances, so must DAOs and working groups.

DAOs can evaluate governance as a full-time business process operation. Proper governance oversight typically requires a full-time person or team maintaining, documenting, and administering governance standards to ensure consistent quality and organization within the DAO or organization. This will help maintain consistency and help people understand who is accountable, especially as the organization scales. DAOs’ governance teams are the referees for the DAO. This group might blow the whistle when they see teams or groups breaching the guidance of the DAOs governance (those parts that are not automated by smart contracts). Having governance KPIs or metrics that track the performance of a process is critical to judging efficiency and being a data-driven organization.

![Coordination takes governance models](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/n0v9-cPddJVG-DtHcYp9b.png?height=1248&width=2402)

Governance does slow down innovation because it can require checks and balances along the way that require approval. This is necessary in big organizations or DAOs when changes could impact multiple stakeholders or cross-functional teams. Considering the processes by which teams come to a consensus on changes is important to align as early as possible. And placing the proper level of governance on people and teams is also a delicate balance, too much governance and it stifles innovation, too little governance, and it leads to disorganization. 

Thankfully on the Ethereum blockchain, smart contracts automate many operational business processes; however, human consensus and voting is still needed for other decisions. Therefore, decision-making processes need to be constructed and engineered to include all relevant stakeholders while optimizing for time efficiency. As web3 becomes more specialized, using tools that allow organizations and contributors to delegate voting power to relevant teams or centralized working groups will be necessary. Inevitably, everyone will be stretched too thin if they need to participate in all decision-making forums.

![Example: Governance process flow for project submissions](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fIDEuBbSHIsy9JM5Dlj00.png?height=196&width=1596)

Thus, decision processes need to be designed to allow for decisions to be made without the need of all stakeholders all the time. There needs to be a governance system in place that allows all parties to know that the rules are being adhered to while giving the relevant parties a voice to influence or give their input asynchronously. For each decision-making point or user entry point, it is important for there to be transparency on who is the decision-maker or decision-process. And depending on the process or decision, there might be on-chain voting or decision-making.

DAO contributors need to understand that every single team or unit within the DAO is going to need structure and a governance process. As stated earlier, governance can span every single aspect of an organization or team. However, it is up to the individual team to determine the business usefulness of documenting their governance processes.

Some governance processes are intuitive and do not necessitate being written down. However, complex processes that include numerous decision-making bodies or cross-functional teams should consider documenting their governance processes or their SLAs (service level agreements) so there is transparency in who is accountable for what and how the business system is architecture.

Imagine a working team of 3-5 people. There’s one team lead and 3 to 4 supporting members. Everyone recognizes the lead as the decision-maker and all others as inputters or recommenders. In small teams, the undocumented governance model works because all parties can communicate and share information easily with each other. As soon as DAOs or teams begin to scale and all parties are unable to collaborate, communicate, or share information on a regular basis, there is a critical need to document processes and standards as DAO contributors will be looking for guidance on how to contribute, produce consistent results, or vote in decision-making proposals.

Moreover, DAO governance is not a copy-paste type of situation. There is not a governance model that will be a one-size fits all. However, there are governance principles that all DAOs will be able to consider in their models when building out their DAO’s governance.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hHEpUGhVx_dTf_XieRhAv.jpeg?height=1200&width=1200)

### The RAD Governance Model

The RAD governance model for decision-making is good place for DAO teams to begin when setting up important business processes or working groups. RAD stands for: Recommender, Approver, and Decision-maker.

1. Who are the Recommenders?
   1. These are the DAO contributors that most likely have boots on the ground and are doing the day-to-day work. They see the issues in real-time or are confronted with the next event that needs addressing first. Most of all DAO contributors will fall into this category. They have experience in their industry or working team, and they provide valuable feedback to the Approver on their perspectives, insights.
2. Who is the Approver?
   1. This is the individual(s) that signs off before it goes to the decision-maker.
      1. The approver is going to be someone close to the daily operations, such as a team lead or a manager of a working group. The approver is able to provide operational or daily feedback, without slowing down operations.
   2. The approver can likewise be group consensus or an individual. Each DAO or team will need to decide how they come to consensus at each decision-making point, with trade-offs between decision efficiency and group consensus.
3. Who is the Decision-maker?
   1. Establishing the decision-maker: is it a group, an individual, or voting consensus?
   2. Finding the “right” level for the decision-maker is critical.
      1. Too high up the hierarchy, and you burden decision-making all on one person; too low in the org hierarchy, and you might be slowing down critical decision-making processes.

![RAD Governance Model](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/SPpn0faQsgpEHyZBUb55u.png?height=340&width=1026)

The RAD governance and business decision-making model can help identify teams or individuals that will be accountable for either off-chain or on-chain decision-making. As DAOs scale it will be harder and harder for all contributors to participate in all relevant decisions, which is why continuing to be flexible in governance models is paramount.

### Off-chain and On-chain Governance

Off-chain governance relates to decisions and votes that occur off-chain and are not recorded on a blockchain with a signed address. Off-chain governance is essential for speed and quick execution on daily operational tasks that do not require community consensus or a full DAO vote. The pro of off-chain governance voting is the speed of operations execution and decision-making. The obvious drawback is there is little to no transparency into how people voted, why a decision was made, or if the DAO’s governance process was followed.

[Snapshot.org](http://Snapshot.org) is one of the most widely used off-chain governance sites.

On-chain governance relates to decisions and votes that are signed and confirmed with a recorded signature on-chain. The pro of on-chain governance is that it is transparent and allows community members to participate and verifiably sign their opinion. The drawback is that these on-chain governance models can slow down decision-making due to more time needed for communication and coordination amongst all parties to submit votes. This can be overcome by having clear requirements for on-chain and off-chain voting (which is where the new lawyers come in).

The most meaningful on-chain governance protocols is [withTally.com](http://withTally.com). WithTally provides DAOs the toolset to conduct on-chain governance through voting and delegation. WithTally is building a full product tool suite for DAOs. [Aragon Network](https://aragon.org/) could be viewed a competitor.

### Summary

DAOs must evaluate the business processes and governance models that best suit the organization. DAOs will be required to select or construct the governance process that fits best for that team and situation too. subDAOs incentive models can be different than the rest of the DAO based on the specific need or skillset. With tokenization, there becomes the ability to reward ultra-specific expert knowledge with organizations. The more governance processes can be streamlined and replicated, the easier it will be for the DAO to scale and grow the number of contributors. Governance processes ought to be open to changes and edits as the DAO or contributors grow and change.

DAOs are still in the early days of best-known methods for human coordination and governance. There will be many A/B testing of code and governance standards. Products like [withTally](https://www.withtally.com/) will help teams and DAO contributors be able to delegate or vote on important proposals that influence the direction of the DAO.

title: Virtual Real Estate is Real Real Estate (a first draft)
body:
“So you’re telling me people are spending thousands of dollars on imaginary land?!” This has become one of *those* jokes. Everyone seems to think they’re clever when they drop it on me. The tone always suggests they half expect me to stammer, “Oh my God… I… I never thought of it that way…” Instead, I tend to just reply, “Yep.” 

Why argue? The people who ask it don’t want to understand anything. They just want to make a point about how dumb they think buyers of virtual real estate are.

It was an incredible affirmation for me, then, when someone with the reputation and standing of Dr. David Chalmers weighed in with many of the same thoughts I had on the matter. He is best known as a philosopher of mind and consciousness, particularly due to his formulation of what he called “the easy and hard problems of consciousness.” ¹ In recent years, though, Dr. Chalmers has turned his attention more fully to virtual worlds and simulations, as well as their implications for the primary questions of philosophy. These thoughts came together as a roughly 500-page volume entitled *Reality+,* ² which premiered (fortuitously enough) not long after Mark Zuckerberg’s infamous “Meta Announcement” of late 2021.

The various ideas of the book are arranged around one central assertion: “virtual worlds are real”. \[p.12\] If Chalmers’ reasons for saying this are correct, it means virtual objects also really exist, and — the reason for this particular article — that virtual real estate is *real* real estate.

 
 

#### Getting “real”

Unfortunately, there is no consensus as to what makes something “real.” Like so many matters of philosophy, when one unpacks what one specifically means by the word, things quickly become complicated. For this reason, there is a whole philosophical field called “ontology,” ³ that deals with matters of reality and existence, and the questions these create have existed since at least the time of Plato and Socrates. So, rather than attempt to be the first person to set up an unassailable definition of the term, Chalmers references others’ thoughts on the matter and demonstrates how virtual worlds meet all of their criteria.

The most common understanding of reality is also the one elucidated by the Oxford dictionary: “the state of things as they actually exist”. Chalmers calls this the argument of **Reality as Existence**. For virtual real estate to meet this standard, it must be shown that it exists. And, indeed, it does. Virtual worlds exist as bits —the 1s and 0s indicating the states of real transistors in real computers. If those bits did not exist how they do, there would be no way for the computer to render the space they encode.

Still, most philosophers feel that “reality as existence” is not persuasive, as it just forces one to ask a nearly identical question: “What is it to exist?”. This folk definition is not just unhelpful for that reason, but also because it doesn’t aid us in our attempt to distinguish between reality and illusion. Illusions and hallucinations exist at least within one’s own mind, so one would be forced to conclude they, too, are real. This has led to the next step up: the argument of **Reality as Mind-Independence**. 

This is the more typical approach within philosophy itself. “Reality as Mind-Independence” argues that your phone is real, for example, because it would continue to exist in the world even if there were no people to think about it. Unicorns, by contrast, are not real because they only exist in our minds. This rather neatly solves the issue posed by illusions and hallucinations. And within the technical language of philosophy, the term “realism” refers to exactly this conception. Thus, phrases like “moral realism” or “aesthetic realism” are an expression of one’s belief that “good and bad” or “beautiful and ugly” are qualities that actually exist in the world — not just within the human mind.⁴

If we accept reality as mind-independence, we have no problem demonstrating that they are real. Their “persistance,” even when nobody is using them, is actually one of their defining qualities.⁵ It separates them from things like multiplayer game levels or single-player worlds. Virtual worlds continue running, with or without humans participating. Their states change according to their programs, and when you log back in, things will be slightly different even though there may have been nobody there to observe the change.

These are just two, but there are other formulations that Chalmers puts forward in the book: **Reality as Causal Power**, **Reality as Authenticity,** **Reality as Measurability,**” and so on. Chalmers demonstrates that virtual worlds pass through the filter each time, no matter which approach you take. They are not illusory, fake, or make-believe.

 
 

#### Analog and Digital

It’s important to understand, though, that this is not to say that virtual real estate and physical real estate are the same thing. They are not. They are simply composed of two different substrates. One is made up of 1s and 0s, and the other of quarks and other fundamental particles. Still, both exist. 

Perhaps I’m belaboring the point, but I’d say that if you have doubts, put it to the test. Ignore the digital for a week — texts, emails, digital documents found on any computer — and see if there aren’t repercussions. That should settle any questions that linger about the digital’s causative power or its mind-independent existence.

Interestingly, in my own field, I find the digital is quickly becoming *more* consequential than its analog counterpart. When someone signs a listing agreement with me, I scan it and load it into our software. From there, I no longer have any particular use for the actual paper and ink cop. It would seem that the sole purpose of the analog format is now to allow me to create a digital copy for all parties to use. If the former never existed at all, I could just as easily work with something signed electronically. Strangely, the digital contract is in some way more real and vital than the analog version it was derived from.

We’ve had decades now to come to understand that digital objects are truly as real as the physical, but it’s a difficult paradigm to take on board in a serious fashion. Perhaps because we’re biological beings privilege the physical, even if such behavior has begun to pass out of fashion. Even I, a person who writes about virtual real estate for my own income, still find myself in articles contrasting virtual world objects with “real-world” objects. It’s a difficult habit to overcome. The proper distinction is probably that of the digital and the physical — or perhaps digital and analog, which is a dichotomy we’ve already seen taken onboard in the world of audio and video without too much difficulty. 

Virtual worlds, finally, are not pretend, either. Nor are the sections of it we call virtual real estate. Indeed, people are currently buying, selling, leasing, developing, and monetizing virtual real estate. Although still a relatively small asset class, it affects lives, and it’s time to take it with a certain level of seriousness. Are people paying thousands for imaginary real estate? No *real estate*. The only pretending left is those who still pretend it’s imaginary.

title: Crew Card - Roadmap
body:
1. `Outcasts of the Wasteland`
2. `Wasteland Shoes`
3. `Exclusive Airdrops & Physicals`

Crew cards are exclusive digital collectables consisting of only 200 NFTs. Originally designed as the mint pass for the Genesis NFT, their use has evolved into much more. In the future, the crew cards will become one of the strong pillars of the Wasteland Cactus Crew ecosystem.

## Outcasts of the Wasteland

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9KlFvfWH6iCDGHJk2_8RA.png?height=576&width=1440)

Outcasts are a product of the creative freedom from Walter, the Artist of WLCC! For each crew card, you own you will be able to claim 1 Outcast Cacti for free.

[https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/uEtCVc1Wtmykh4LmqRzulAbwDmLM2-VZ21CexOpyX0I](https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/uEtCVc1Wtmykh4LmqRzulAbwDmLM2-VZ21CexOpyX0I)

## Wasteland Shoes

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_NZ6GpZnstFc6VArhEwdV.png?height=829&width=1200)

Crew Card holders will have the opportunity to mint 1/200 exclusive custom created shoes, an example where this has been done before is RTFKT x JeffStaple. Custom designed & manufactured.

Holders can sell the NFT and/or ship the shoe directly to their homes, whilst claiming the shoe! There will be a feature in the dashboard where you can check if a specific shoe number has already been claimed. If it has been claimed, it means that someone has used the NFT already to claim the physical version of the shoes! If it has not yet been claimed, you can buy the NFT and claim the physical shoe with the NFT. It all depends on if a Crew Card holder wants to claim a shoe with the NFT, or sell the NFT without claiming it!

## Exclusive Airdrops & Physicals

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m7Zq3X7eLVjrU_RB5WTc6.png?height=829&width=1200)

Crew Card holders will get access to exclusive WLCC airdrops and physicals that drop further down the Wasteland storyline. 

Further utility for the crew card has not yet been disclosed.

title: Wasteland Cactus Crew - Roadmap
body:
1. `The $WSTLND Token`
 2. `WLCC Metaverse`
 3. `A step into the Physical world`
 4. `Artist Support - Back to the roots`
 5. `Community`
 6. `Comic Series`
 7. `Crew Cards`
 8. `Sprouts`
 9. `Mobile App`
10. `Airdrops`
11. `Events & Galleries`

## Introduction

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ho61J7H5FqVLcajwmMJkm.png?height=1365&width=3413)

Wasteland Cactus Crew entered the blockchain in **September 2021**. The collection’s supply is limited to 5000 NFTs and is made up of over **300 unique traits**.

Our mission is to use our outstanding art and roadmap with artist spotlighting, giveaways, and marketing to continue to build the absolute best community in the NFT space whilst providing **true value to our holders.**

## 1. The $WSTLND Token

### The use of $WSTLND

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PEafXiNH5njGo40RYyD0L.png?height=1440&width=1950)

You will be able to use your $WSTLND tokens for things such as but not limited to; Wagering in the Casino, purchase of items from our Black Market, and interacting with future WLCC-related collections for example breeding two cacti to make a Sprout.

The token will act as a tender for making purchases of any form of exchange that would require a symbol of value in the Cactiverse.

### Tokenomics

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Y-XlRMjXpcuGvCE81QBPK.png?height=1440&width=1950)

Our genesis WLCC NFTs can be staked in [our Dashboard](https://dash.wlcc.io) in exchange for 10 $WSTLND per NFT staked, per 24-hour cycle.

`1 $WSTLND = 1 $WSTLND`

## 2. WLCC Metaverse

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JA94N5DIMsSDA9yeSPaZn.png?height=934&width=1065)

WLCC has acquired two plots of land in the SANDBOX metaverse on which we plan to deploy a multifaceted gaming experience once SANDBOX releases. We have contracted highly sought-after sandbox/pixel art team "ARQONIX: metavoxel studio", an official SANDBOX and metakey partner, to create a unique Cacti-verse experience for you to explore as Voxel Cacti! The Wasteland Casino is ready and waiting! We plan to deploy other mini-games in the SANDBOX metaverse on these plots over time.

`Coordinates of our plots:` [149, 98](https://www.sandbox.game/en/lands/12834633-8004-4570-8d84-6128aa3548d2/) & [149, 97](https://www.sandbox.game/en/lands/2ab33302-e5dc-44b1-93e7-f4608ac940b4/)

## 3. A step into the Physical World

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/SSz85bPdWAKsEDEtj7sZs.png?height=3385&width=3840)

As already mentioned WLCC will have way more utility than just in the digital world. With our collection of aesthetic physicals, our project will hold worth in both worlds.

The physicals are only the beginning, a tip of the iceberg; physicals will form a big part of this project in the future. Our goal is to scale WLCC into a **globally recognized brand** in this space.

### Statue

We’ll be handing out statues modeled after **Biff**, a character created by Walter for Wasteland Cactus Crew. Each statue is hand-made by a renowned Mexican craftsman with over 10 years of experience in making toys. The figures are made of ceramic and are 7.5 inches tall. The sword can be taken off the back.

> **Total Supply:** `200`

### Rugs

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UfsJ0nvXPSnwmjlN9aEHf.png?height=1024&width=1639)

Another one of our physicals is rugs made up of natural wool. They stretch a length of 3.2 feet. The producers behind this item have worked with high-end companies such as shoe manufacturers, shoe stores, and beverage manufacturers.

> **Total Supply:** `20`

## 4. Artist Support - ‘‘Back to the roots’’

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J_7IQQoQNFNURyZLIfepK.png?height=1926&width=2290)

We recognize the integral part artists play in the existence of this project. That's why we'll be giving back to the broader digital art community to show our appreciation. To this end, we have set up an initiative focused on our artists’ welfare called **“Back to the Roots”***.* The **"WLCC Art Competition''** is a product of this initiative.

The event serves as a podium for underground artists in the digital craft space to find exposure for their work. It gives artists the creative freedom of expressing the full width of their imagination by creating digital art pieces. We set the themes, and the artists are given one week to make submissions. After compiling a set of judges picks the best work.

## 5. Community

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2cQ2nk4re_FL2oFBSAqzS.png?height=1055&width=2000)

Our goal is to create a fun, engaged interactive community with efficient communication by providing online forums for Wastelanders to chat, share opinions and make suggestions about the project. In addition, we intend to carry every member along by updating holders on our project's progress and recent developments via AMA meetings and regular announcements through our Discord channel and other social media platforms.

### Wasteland Alpha

As a holder of a WLCC NFT, exclusive channels are accessible in the Discord server which includes access to the latest real-time Alpha calls made by expert analysts in this space.

### Game Nights

WLCC community game nights will be driven by our Game Masters, these will be a mix of appointed community members and sought-out help to fill out the team. Game Masters will publish a weekly schedule for their events for things such as but not limited to; "Crab game" Free to download via Steam, Gartic guessing games, Rumble Royale, Smash Karts (free to play on the web), Poker tournaments, LOL Beans (free to play on the web) and much more over time! Expect prizes at every event for those who engage and contribute! Things like Water, WLCC NFTs, partner NFTs, Crew cards and more COULD be given away! So be sure to check the schedules posted by our Game Masters!

### Art Livestreams

Not only will our beloved artist, Walter Ostlie be joining us for sessions, we will be using the WLCC brand as a launchpad to help introduce artists to the world of web3 and NFTs. If you search across platforms such as LinkedIn there are professional indie artists who are trying to crack through into this new digital era of art and expression. We plan to host featured artists as they share with our Wasteland world the process of the creation of their art. We hope you'll join us as we look to be a positive source for people as they look to make that scary transition into the world we know and love so well.

### Giveaways

The WLCC community vault is currently stocked with a small army of WLCC genesis cacti. We will use these strategically in a variety of ways such as but not limited to; Twitter reach raffles, Discord game events, AMA and Twitter spaces raffles, Rewards for artists featured in our Live streams and raffles during those events, and much more. As we run out of giveaway NFT we will use royalties to sweep the floor and continue to use those as giveaway rewards - NEVER to be resold by the team once swept with royalties, ONLY to be used as community giveaway/rewards. We expect to host giveaways for $WSTLND as well as the Discord currency, Water.

## 6. Comic Series

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-LDe3DxvyGK6gg87FUZ60.png?height=1253&width=1319)

The WLCC comic series is something the team is extremely excited and proud to bring to the world. Walter Ostlie has been a career comic artist with plenty of work to cite in both comics as well as NFT art. Walter has partnered with the WLCC team to proudly present the story of the Wasteland Cactus Crew! The first edition of our esteemed comic collection will proudly display a collaborative effort approved and co-promoted by none other than the Kaiju Kingz! The WLCC Genesis collection has over 12 distinct "1 of 1" special unique cacti characters. Over time we expect to produce not only collaborative comics but also stories behind the unique characters Walter has created!

Don't forget! Crew Card holders have the ability to FREE CLAIM an Outcast which will generate a royalty PER PAGE that your outcast is used in NON Collaboration comics.

Our comic series will be sold individually by "series/issue" and only be viewable by the connected wallets containing the comic NFT. Holders of the comic NFT will have the option to claim a physical copy to be professionally published and bound, then delivered straight to your door!

## 7. Crew Cards

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e3GqgSvsfcUstGJBLpisv.png?height=720&width=1440)

Crew cards are exclusive digital collectibles consisting of only 200 NFTs. Originally designed as the mint pass for the Genesis NFT, their use has evolved into much more. In the future, the crew cards will become one of the strong pillars of the Wasteland Cactus Crew ecosystem.

[https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/svz-KkzbYtzJDj47V7z4oEhSS6Dz9GKU-t_r5mlGM2o](https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/svz-KkzbYtzJDj47V7z4oEhSS6Dz9GKU-t_r5mlGM2o)

## 8. Sprouts

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5NRSNP3FprUcMZ6LydCNu.png?height=576&width=1440)

The Wasteland Cactus Crew is proud to present, the Sprouts - another collection in the WLCC Cactiverse, minted through the WLCC utility token $WSTLND! The Sprouts will be created through a unique breeding experience. There will be a limit of 5000 Wasteland Sprouts available from breeding.

### Breeding Process

We wanted our community to have an engaging experience that was not only fun and interactive but requires time invested to make this an experience to remember. To breed a Sprout you will need; 2 Genesis WLCC NFTs and 350 $WSTLND, Water and Fertilizer.

### Phase 1

In exchange for burning 350 $WSTLND, you will be given a Flower Pot. This Flower Pot is very special, make sure to handle it with care! Water your Flower Pot and wait for 4 hours and 20 minutes (4:20) to see the Sprout metadata refresh to phase 2!

### Phase 2

In phase 2 you will notice a change in your Flower Pot, a Sprout may be starting to take form! In this phase, you will Fertilize your Sprout and wait for another 4:20 when your Sprout will reveal its final true metadata. You will be able to re-breed the same genesis WLCC and the Sprout traits will be assigned at random, not specific to their parents. You can only have 5 Flower Pots at one time however once your Sprouts have been revealed, you may breed again until the 5,000 have been created.

## 9. Mobile App

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/H1qJALfQjONhBxMSHmW3p.jpeg?height=1440&width=1950)

WLCC is coming to your phones with a native-built mobile app for iOS and Android devices. The app replicates the functionality which is available in the web dashboard but also includes additional features and widgets you can use on your device.

* Track the Rarity and Traits of the Cacti in your collection
* Header Creator using your WLCC collection
* Add the WLCC NFT widget to showcase your favorite WLCC
* View your $WSTLND balance and staking statistics

## 10. Airdrops

After sprouts, the team will begin expanding the Wasteland Crew collection with a special airdrop. Each WLCC NFT will receive one airdrop.

## 11. Events & Galleries

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MoPLUkALuPk7koYbwAnLj.png?height=1055&width=2000)

WLCC is an international brand with a small community spread across the globe, as our community grows and the demand matches we will begin booking booths at popular NFT events in both EU and US locations. Until then, we will continue to hold events in the metaverse in varying ways. There are growing platforms where spaces can be held in VR, platforms known well such as Twitter and Discord already are great outlets for our Degenerative Cacti meetings! There will be some surprises along the way as we develop new partnerships and friends in the art world, so be sure to stay tuned to where you may find Walter's art next!

title: Die "eierlegende Wollmilchsau"?
body:
Was ist das für ein Titel? Wir Österreicher sagen zu einem Produkt das eigentlich alles kann “**eierlegende Wollmilchsau**”. Doch wie passt das zu **[Minds](https://www.minds.com/register?referrer=moneyfoxx)**?

Wie ihr bereits wisst, bin ich absoluter Fan von **Projekten auf der Blockchain**. Es vergeht kein Tag an dem ich nicht mindestens ein Projekt näher unter die Lupe nehme. Mir geht es dabei bei vielen Projekten nicht um den Gewinn, sondern um das Projekt selbst.

### Minds sollte Standard werden!

[Minds](https://www.minds.com/register?referrer=moneyfoxx) ist eine Plattform die für viele Dinge genutzt werden kann. Für Business Kunden ist es eine Kombination aus **Webseite, Blog, Newsfeed und Social Media**, alles verbunden auf einer einzigen Plattform. Wer sich jetzt als Unternehmen auf Minds Pro setzt, kann mit einem **Einmalkauf** lebenslang die besten Funktionen der Plattform nutzen.

Zusätzlich ist es viel einfacher Beiträge auf MINDS zu **bewerben**, als auf allen Anderen Plattformen, da es ja mit deinem Wallet verbunden ist.

Warum nutzen Blockchain Projekte **Discord**? Ganz ehrlich, ich weiß es nicht. Besonders Blockchain Projekte sollten eine dezentrale Plattform unterstützten. Hilfst du mir, helfe ich dir.

### Soll ich Minds auch nutzen?

Ganz einfach beantwortet **JA**! Auch wenn die Anzahl der User noch nicht mit Facebook, Instagram oder Twitter vergleichbar ist, sollten wir als Krypto Freaks dezentrale Plattformen nutzen. Minds ist in erster Linie ein **Ersatz für Facebook**, kann jedoch noch viel mehr. Du bekommst ebenso **Belohnungen** für das Halten von Token, wenn du Liquidität zur Verfügung stellst und wenn Leute auf deine Beiträge reagieren.

Zusätzlich müssen die Leute die Interesse an deinen Beiträgen haben nicht bei Minds anmelden um deinen Content lesen zu können.

![Du kannst bares Geld verdienen.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_27Nk4j0KyplKsO7OggAO.png?height=794&width=1065)

### Funktionen von Minds

Auf die gesamte Palette an Funktionen die Minds, Minds+ oder Minds Pro bieten, kann ich in diesem Artikel gar nicht eingehen. Unternehmen die Interesse an Minds haben, können mich über [mein Profil](https://www.minds.com/moneyfoxx/) gerne persönlich kontaktieren.

Für dich als Krypto Freak bietet die Plattform:

* Feed (Facebook, Twitter) und du wirst für deine Beiträge und Aktivität belohnt
* Chat und Gruppenchat
* Stories
* Video Plattform
* Redefreiheit (keine Zensur durch staatliche Instanzen, jedoch Community Prüfung)
* Blog (ich verwende hier aktuell mirror.xyz)
* Verdienstmöglichkeiten (zB für Blogger, Influencer,…)

### Die Zukunft von Minds

Hoffentlich bringen wir sehr viele Leute dazu dezentrale Plattformen zu nutzen, auch wenn es zu Beginn mühsam ist. Minds ist für mich ein **absoluter Favorit**, da es fast unendliche Möglichkeiten bietet. Zusätzlich setzt sich Minds für die Redefreiheit von uns Allen ein. Ich bitte euch, arbeiten wir gemeinsam an einer dezentralen Zukunft. **[Gibt Minds eine Chance!](https://www.minds.com/register?referrer=moneyfoxx)**

title: Slatan, What's Next?
body:
*Disclaimer: this article may present personal points of view on the matter at the time of writing. Those opinions may change in the future.*

## WHAT’S NEXT?

As a creative, and part of an [active music duo](https://open.spotify.com/artist/68GrUSLjB1nY8Iri2lcvHx), I strive everyday to explore every avenue in the search to achieve my life goals and team visions. With this grindset, I experienced multiple burnouts 🥴

![Gotta have that](https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/002/129/639/b28.jpg)

So I wandered… and followed the rabbit 🐇

![](http://25.media.tumblr.com/94970209387d74d0cdf79dab0c7b3a2f/tumblr_myo2hr97No1skltbdo1_500.gif)

Then I found out about this **new fucking thing**. Cool and fun shit. It’s like owning a trading card (Pokémon, Yu-Gi-Oh! etc) but it’s digital and online. Call it [digital collectibles](https://opensea.io/explore-collections). I read some may come with perks too! 😮

![Chads dueling in the meatspace ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tF7vyOpehCcgiTCBCfXal.jpg?height=2048&width=1536)

If we were to assume [digital collectible](https://opensea.io/explore-collections) as Lego blocks, we could stack more dope things on top of it right? 🤔 Like merch redemption or something… you know, like if you have the collectible, then you can redeem something out of it.

![](https://c.tenor.com/iVPfMIfOSY0AAAAC/lego-stacking.gif)

You see, If I were to own [Holo Charizard](https://www.trollandtoad.com/pokemon/base-set-unlimited-singles/charizard-4-102-holo-rare-unlimited/148917) after all these years, it would be nice if Pokémon let me redeem some of their official merchandises for free. Why not? 🤷🏽

When I thought of applying the same mental framework on music in general, I was like damn we could have infinite fun with this! Then I thought of something…

## 🛰️SLATANWORLD🌐

### YOU NEED A-TEAM!

Previously, I tried to pilot program the **game** by building **🛰️SLATANWORLD🌐** but it seems clear to me that I need a team for this to be fun. You could dig more on what’s been done while we clean things up because…

[https://twitter.com/slatanworld/status/1538339393617874944?s=20&t=89U0RI0I3Vj9Xz2eLrsnnA](https://twitter.com/slatanworld/status/1538339393617874944?s=20&t=89U0RI0I3Vj9Xz2eLrsnnA)

As we **[0108 SLATAN](https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3JJh7rjnQXXGcNQUJkOL4Z)** progressed in music, we managed to team up with these super talented friend of mine and his team **[@summerwatchorg](https://twitter.com/summerwatchorg)** to help us polish the **game** that we are about to roll-out very soon 😈

## WHAT’S THE “GAME”?

At its current phase,**🛰️[SLATANWORLD](https://slatan.xyz/)🌐** is still developing. We will work together for the next Slatan Album: SKL DSPs roll-out campaign. It’s going to be a fun music experience from Slatan. Hopefully lol

To be continued…

title: WLCC Whitepaper
body:
1. `Introduction to WLCC`
2. `Objectives`
3. `A step into the Physical world`
4. `$WSTLND Token`
5. `Tokenomics`
6. `Crew Cards`
7. `The Team`
8. `Official Links`

## 1. Introduction

![''Biff'' - The main character of WLCC](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vhAqQSTsx-80RGKxc89pX.png?height=3513&width=3509)

Wasteland Cactus Crew is a generative collection of **5,000** prickly **Cacti PFPs**. Comprised of over **200 unique traits** including backgrounds, accessories, clothing, facial expressions, jewelry & much more.

Get ready to immerse yourself in our unique Cactiverse comprised of the Genesis collection, an exclusive pass collection called Crew Card, the Outcast collection, and the Sprouts collection. Each will play an integral role in the future of the Wasteland!

Our mission is to create a global brand centered around our beloved main character, Biff. Our brand will be supported by our amazing community which stems from all walks of life and parts of the globe. We will succeed in this mission by delivering an exceptional experience, our Cactiverse. While growing to be a brand you can trust in web3, we plan to also produce exceptional physical merchandise in the niches we plan to operate; Comics, physical statues, clothing, jewelry, shoes, and much more!

> `“There is no turning back once you cross into the wasteland…“`

![Wasteland Cactus Crew - Collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JwZePGc-3JvBkhBH1yaAs.png?height=1365&width=3413)

Although NFTs projects are making huge strides, there are still gaps that we are looking to fill. NFTs are beginning to dominate the virtual world with lots of new exciting tech and applications although many still have a hard time understanding their relevance in the *real world*.

## 2. Objectives

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ux8Vhn4xGwOmT1MlKuKxA.png?height=1007&width=2000)

The team behind WLCC strives toward a rich NFT project by developing the following key areas:

* `Community Building`
* `Utility`
* `The Metaverse`
* `Outstanding Mechanisms / Physicals`

### Community Building

We learned about the importance of a strong community very early in our journey. The base support of a loyal community propels a project to the loftiest of heights.

In addition, nothing beats the thrill of having a cohort of fellow cacti that share the same vision and passion, united by the common goal of building something worthwhile *together*.

WLCC also knows how to have fun. In addition to serving as an administrative platform, our Discord Server hosts all sorts of entertaining activities. We organize games and contests, which creates an avenue for community members to mix it up and interact with each other whilst getting to know more about the team and community supporting WLCC.

Our goal is to create a fun, engaged interactive community with efficient communication by providing online forums for Wastelanders to chat, share opinions and make suggestions about the project. Furthermore, we intend to carry every member along by updating holders on our project's progress and recent developments via AMA meetings and regular announcements through our Discord channel and other social media platforms.

### Art Contests

![Previous Art Competitions](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U6_t2twZRdsGFpwRcTf0L.png?height=1926&width=2290)

We recognize the integral part artists play in the existence of this project. That’s why we'll be giving back to the broader digital art community to show our appreciation. To this end, we have set up an initiative focused on our artists’ welfare called **“Back to the Roots”**. The **"WLCC Art Competition''** is a product of this initiative. The event serves as a podium for underground artists in the digital craft space to find exposure for their work. It gives artists the creative freedom to express their imagination's full width by creating digital art pieces. We set the themes, and the artists are given one week to make submissions. After compiling, a set of judges picks the best work.

### Utility

`WLCC promises to develop a unique project by creating utility for holders.`

Our NFTs go beyond mere digital art with a collectible value; WLCC will also be assigning scores of concrete value to them such as **exclusive in-person membership, special access to events, physicals & much more!**

[https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/jkRqVnWorRsEoO-2AxA8BSKW1_nfJnCTqKnWfRd8GDc](https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/jkRqVnWorRsEoO-2AxA8BSKW1_nfJnCTqKnWfRd8GDc)

### The Metaverse

WLCC is very aware of the present while also securing space in the future, and where is that, `The Metaverse`. We will be extending our presence to the Metaverse through the acquisition of land in [The Sandbox](https://www.sandbox.game/en/).

> `Coordinates of our plots:` [149, 98](https://www.sandbox.game/en/lands/12834633-8004-4570-8d84-6128aa3548d2/) & [149, 97](https://www.sandbox.game/en/lands/2ab33302-e5dc-44b1-93e7-f4608ac940b4/)

## 3. A step into the Physical world

As already mentioned WLCC will have way more utility than just in the digital world. With our collection of aesthetic physicals, our project will hold worth in both worlds.

The physicals are only the beginning, a tip of the iceberg; physicals will form a big part of this project in the future. Our goal is to **dominate** the NFT space in this topic.

### Statue

![In-hand images of the statues ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/u21yuBmw8YmeRwRypuSX5.png?height=3603&width=4087)

We’ll be handing out statues modeled after **Biff**, the main character created by Walter for Wasteland Cactus Crew. Each statue is hand-made & hand-painted by a renowned Mexican craftsman with over 10 years of experience in making toys. The figures are made of ceramic and are 7.5 inches tall.

> **Supply**: `200`

### Rugs

![In-hand rug images](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/om57k0H6rV62u815JXrHo.png?height=1926&width=2290)

Another one of our physicals is rugs made up of **natural wool**. They stretch a length of 3.2 feet. The producers behind this item have worked with high-end companies such as shoe manufacturers, stores, and beverage manufacturers.

> **Supply**: `20`

## 4. $WSTLND Token

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nUtQB3A0E47On5dr5xHqJ.png?height=2075&width=2690)

Launched in Q1 2022, the $WSTLND token is the native token for WLCC. It serves as a governance and utility token for upcoming developments in the WLCC Ecosystem.

> `1 $WSTLND = 1 $WSTLND`

### Sandbox

$WSTLND tokens will act as a tender for making purchases of any form of exchange that would require a symbol of value in the Cactiverse.

Our native Token will possess an earning potential. Users can wager them in the WLCC Casino for a chance to win Tokens, NFTs, or even the **Big** **Jackpot**.

In addition, $WSTLND token holders are entitled to certain perks and exclusive access to challenges, contests, and community events held in the Metaverse.

### Black Market

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/r0fDh-BqxLt-R5SxrYSvA.png?height=1575&width=2163)

We have a huge marketplace featuring Physicals and never seen merch, Sandbox items, NFTs, and more. The exchange of these items will be done exclusively with the $WSTLND token.

### Breeding

![Breedpot - Stage 2](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/siGXTVHkBg-z4i_30SJhx.png?height=2000&width=2000)

The Wasteland Cactus Crew is proud to present **The Sprouts** - another collection in the WLCC Cactiverse, minted through the WLCC utility token $WSTLND!

The Sprouts will be created through a truly unique breeding and germination experience. There will be **5,000** Sprouts in total. We wanted our community to have an engaging experience that was not only fun and interactive but requires time invested to make this an experience to remember.

To breed a Sprout you will need; **2 Genesis WLCC NFT's and 350 $WSTLND**. In exchange for burning your $WSTLND you will be given a `Breedpot`. This pot is very special, make sure to handle it with care!

Add water to your Breedpot and wait for 4:20 (4 hours and 20 minutes) to see the Metadata refresh to phase 2! In phase 2 you will notice a change in your Flower Pot, a Sprout may be starting to take form! In this phase, you will Fertilize your Sprout and wait another 4:20 when your Sprout will reveal its final true metadata.

> `Breed 2 Genesis WLCC & burn 350 $WSTLND to receive a Breedpot`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mtTQokK0K57QBH0a_h1br.png?height=576&width=1440)

## 5. Tokenomics

![Tokenomics Graphic](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NGzdn22HCNiLuqNdPea7E.png?height=1052&width=1823)

WLCC has designed deflationary tokenomics for our $WSTLND Token to ensure its continuous appreciation of value. We intend to create a limited supply by capping the total amount of tokens in circulation at `20 million`.

### Distribution

We allotted fractions of our tokens to different sections to aid the circulation and liquidity of the ecosystem. The WLCC Team divided the distribution of the token into varying portions between the following sections as given below.

body:

## 1. Introduction

![''Biff'' - The main character of WLCC](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vhAqQSTsx-80RGKxc89pX.png?height=3513&width=3509)

Wasteland Cactus Crew is a generative collection of **5,000** prickly **Cacti PFPs**. Comprised of over **200 unique traits** including backgrounds, accessories, clothing, facial expressions, jewelry & much more.

Get ready to immerse yourself in our unique Cactiverse comprised of the Genesis collection, an exclusive pass collection called Crew Card, the Outcast collection, and the Sprouts collection. Each will play an integral role in the future of the Wasteland!

Our mission is to create a global brand centered around our beloved main character, Biff. Our brand will be supported by our amazing community which stems from all walks of life and parts of the globe. We will succeed in this mission by delivering an exceptional experience, our Cactiverse. While growing to be a brand you can trust in web3, we plan to also produce exceptional physical merchandise in the niches we plan to operate; Comics, physical statues, clothing, jewelry, shoes, and much more!

> `“There is no turning back once you cross into the wasteland…“`

![Wasteland Cactus Crew - Collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JwZePGc-3JvBkhBH1yaAs.png?height=1365&width=3413)

Although NFTs projects are making huge strides, there are still gaps that we are looking to fill. NFTs are beginning to dominate the virtual world with lots of new exciting tech and applications although many still have a hard time understanding their relevance in the *real world*.

## 2. Objectives

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ux8Vhn4xGwOmT1MlKuKxA.png?height=1007&width=2000)

The team behind WLCC strives toward a rich NFT project by developing the following key areas:

* `Community Building`
* `Utility`
* `The Metaverse`
* `Outstanding Mechanisms / Physicals`

### Community Building

We learned about the importance of a strong community very early in our journey. The base support of a loyal community propels a project to the loftiest of heights.

In addition, nothing beats the thrill of having a cohort of fellow cacti that share the same vision and passion, united by the common goal of building something worthwhile *together*.

WLCC also knows how to have fun. In addition to serving as an administrative platform, our Discord Server hosts all sorts of entertaining activities. We organize games and contests, which creates an avenue for community members to mix it up and interact with each other whilst getting to know more about the team and community supporting WLCC.

Our goal is to create a fun, engaged interactive community with efficient communication by providing online forums for Wastelanders to chat, share opinions and make suggestions about the project. Furthermore, we intend to carry every member along by updating holders on our project's progress and recent developments via AMA meetings and regular announcements through our Discord channel and other social media platforms.

### Art Contests

![Previous Art Competitions](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U6_t2twZRdsGFpwRcTf0L.png?height=1926&width=2290)

We recognize the integral part artists play in the existence of this project. That’s why we'll be giving back to the broader digital art community to show our appreciation. To this end, we have set up an initiative focused on our artists’ welfare called **“Back to the Roots”**. The **"WLCC Art Competition''** is a product of this initiative. The event serves as a podium for underground artists in the digital craft space to find exposure for their work. It gives artists the creative freedom to express their imagination's full width by creating digital art pieces. We set the themes, and the artists are given one week to make submissions. After compiling, a set of judges picks the best work.

### Utility

`WLCC promises to develop a unique project by creating utility for holders.`

Our NFTs go beyond mere digital art with a collectible value; WLCC will also be assigning scores of concrete value to them such as **exclusive in-person membership, special access to events, physicals & much more!**

[https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/jkRqVnWorRsEoO-2AxA8BSKW1_nfJnCTqKnWfRd8GDc](https://mirror.xyz/wlcc.eth/jkRqVnWorRsEoO-2AxA8BSKW1_nfJnCTqKnWfRd8GDc)

### The Metaverse

WLCC is very aware of the present while also securing space in the future, and where is that, `The Metaverse`. We will be extending our presence to the Metaverse through the acquisition of land in [The Sandbox](https://www.sandbox.game/en/).

> `Coordinates of our plots:` [149, 98](https://www.sandbox.game/en/lands/12834633-8004-4570-8d84-6128aa3548d2/) & [149, 97](https://www.sandbox.game/en/lands/2ab33302-e5dc-44b1-93e7-f4608ac940b4/)

## 3. A step into the Physical world

As already mentioned WLCC will have way more utility than just in the digital world. With our collection of aesthetic physicals, our project will hold worth in both worlds.

The physicals are only the beginning, a tip of the iceberg; physicals will form a big part of this project in the future. Our goal is to **dominate** the NFT space in this topic.

### Statue

![In-hand images of the statues ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/u21yuBmw8YmeRwRypuSX5.png?height=3603&width=4087)

We’ll be handing out statues modeled after **Biff**, the main character created by Walter for Wasteland Cactus Crew. Each statue is hand-made & hand-painted by a renowned Mexican craftsman with over 10 years of experience in making toys. The figures are made of ceramic and are 7.5 inches tall.

> **Supply**: `200`

### Rugs

![In-hand rug images](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/om57k0H6rV62u815JXrHo.png?height=1926&width=2290)

Another one of our physicals is rugs made up of **natural wool**. They stretch a length of 3.2 feet. The producers behind this item have worked with high-end companies such as shoe manufacturers, stores, and beverage manufacturers.

> **Supply**: `20`

## 4. $WSTLND Token

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nUtQB3A0E47On5dr5xHqJ.png?height=2075&width=2690)

> `1 $WSTLND = 1 $WSTLND`

$WSTLND tokens will act as a tender for making purchases of any form of exchange that would require a symbol of value in the Cactiverse.

In addition, $WSTLND token holders are entitled to certain perks and exclusive access to challenges, contests, and community events held in the Metaverse.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/r0fDh-BqxLt-R5SxrYSvA.png?height=1575&width=2163)

We have a huge marketplace featuring Physicals and never seen merch, Sandbox items, NFTs, and more. The exchange of these items will be done exclusively with the $WSTLND token.

### Breeding

title: 美元资产宏观研究快速笔记（2022/7/2）
body:
**【小结】**

目前美国居民消费，储蓄已经来到多年最低，放水给的钱用完了，消费信心也降低了，但是实际消费支出并没有降低，消费贷来到了多年高点，大家在放水周期已经建立了钱很好来的坏习惯，正在用消费贷弥补储蓄损失带来的购买力下降，但局面不可持续。

**预计下面两个季度消费/需求（映射GDP）的滑坡可能会超出预期。准备迎接二季度GDP -2.0%/-2.5%，7月CPI继续8.2%/8.4%**（GDPNow的预期，从6月30日的-1%下调到了-2.1%；克利夫兰联储nowcasting通胀预测模型，6月CPI通胀或为8.7%，7月或为8.4%）。**此刻要么参与short风险资产，要么等9月。**

**【数据/分析】**

**0.一季度GDP中居民消费增速减缓，在储蓄降低、购买力降低情况下，后续可能继续降低；两个GDP前置先导指标住宅投资和存货投资，同比均在下滑**（能够代表居民和企业对于未来预期的信心）

其中居民消费同比+4.51%、环比+0.45%（环比增长一直在下滑，前3次为+2.88%、+0.49%、+0.63%）

其中住宅投资同比-4.37%、环比+0.11%；其中存货投资同比-313.50%、环比-2.43%

**1.居民储蓄来到5年新低：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Fj5OFF9TW-zv52Cx7T_ZR.png?height=947&width=1330)

**2.消费信心甚至来到20年新低：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-ILcKFfPkbb_fH9es_ciU.png?height=929&width=1380)

**3.但物价（商品占CPI 20%）、租金（占CPI40%）都在提升，所以支出没法减少：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YCZP78N6ZukM9G3VfZcxx.png?height=861&width=1367)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MVsUITVQb0cv0-ImQjzM1.png?height=901&width=1372)

**4.以至于只能借钱消费，以维持储蓄耗尽下高昂的支出**(个人储蓄降低到低点，和消费信贷的增加几乎是同时的，既不存钱又要借钱，大概率是没钱花了，敢于借钱，可能是因为前两年放水让底层的人形成了钱好来/大手花不属于能力范围的钱的习惯)：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/c42I2dKrwnEEd0WJG8Kt1.png?height=829&width=1359)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Er_WBj17CesxezKW-A_Hq.png?height=1073&width=1372)

**5.高杠杆消费下，耐用品需求下滑：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dkm657A0SbSrvIrhXy0Nt.png?height=854&width=1304)

**6.整体企业利润在价格上涨 vs 需求减弱的对冲中，需求减弱占上风，盈利能力降低**（7月底-8月初联储政策空档期，可能出现美国公司Q2季报需求减少带来的营收能力滑坡）：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Bppss0mfyc_yq0za_Dq-0.png?height=1076&width=1383)

**7.且政府和企业均已经在上一个放水周期上严重扩表，政府负债达到GDP 140%：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/olMdif4gglcka-VRufCRT.png?height=853&width=1346)

**8.这将大概率导致需求萎缩带来的GDP滑坡，和通胀自我实现带来的CPI持续高同步维持**

**9.在CPI四大项指标中（服务59%、商品20%、食品14%、能源7%），食品、能源领涨；从各项增速预期，7月潜在继续维持 8.6% + 0.12% -0.20% +0.08 = 8.6%**（数据待调整）

1）服务：1-5月同比+4.10%、+4.40%、+4.70%、+4.90%、+5.20%；持续增长；其中5月租金同比+5.2%，机票价格同比+37.80%持续爬升、随着夏季到来出行旅游价格仍会继续提升；**预期将持续提升（+0.2%/ x 59% = +0.118%）**

2）商品：1-5月同比+11.70%、+12.40%、+11.70%、+9.70%、+8.50%；减缓趋势；其中5月新车、二手车、家具、家电价格同比增长幅度较年初已有下滑6.65%/12.20%、16.10%/40.50%、12.70%/17.00%、6.40%/8.50%；**预期将轻微下行（-1.0% x 20% = -0.20%）**

3）食品：1-5月同比+7.00%、+7.90%、+8.80%、+9.40%、+10.10%；持续增长；其中5月牛奶同比+20%、鸡蛋同比+76%，同比增速仍在提升；**预期将维稳或持续提升（+0.6% x 14% = 0.084%）**

4）能源：1-5月同比+27.00%、+25.70%、+32.20%、+30.20%、+34.40%；持续增长；3月收到战争影响增速提升，战争情况下暂无降低预期；**预期将维持平稳**

**10.和2008年不同的是**：

08年储蓄下滑、信贷上升、但是商品价格/房租价格暴跌，是没钱可花了，供应大于需求；

而目前是储蓄下滑、信贷上升，同时**货币放水导致进入了通胀的自我实现过程**，商品价格/房租价格暴涨，导致的结果就是通胀自我实现的同时，没钱的人可能真的没法正常生活了，一边看到CPI在涨，一边看到GDP在跌，同时前两年放水是放给个人/穷人的M0，政府、企业债务也在放水这一轮需求的扩张大幅扩张了负债表，债务超过了生产力，也超过了当前需求范围

**11.作为联储来说很难办**：

 一方面，如果要让居民过得好，需要做的事情是： 1）继续发钱（疫情期间申请的4.6万亿放水额度，还有2万亿没用），给穷人打钱，能够缓解穷人生存，但是加速通胀； 2）加速利率提升（降低通胀，维持穷人的购买力） 

但加速利率提升很可能会造成一批高杠杆的企业债违约，同时造成GDP的大幅下滑（季度下滑继续超过-2.5%）

另一方面，如果要让企业平稳过渡，需要做的事情就是温和加息，造成的结果和上面这几条相反

那么两边不得罪的做法就是，做一个中性加息，让市场自我调节，是否能够两边都不那么阵痛，亦或将代价甩锅给时间和市场，但这样可能啥都治不好，市场两端自我修复的难度太大了

大概率GDP由需求下滑带来的下滑还没有真正体现出来，CPI的控制也做不到（通胀的自我实现控制不了）

准备迎接二季度GDP -2.0%/-2.5%，CPI继续8.2%/8.4%（的情况下缩表和加息抽走了更多的钱->以及真钱对应的杠杆的资金）

**12.此刻要么参与short，要么等9月**

## Posted on May 10

In the forest, wind sifted through the cedar and birch trees, and I struggled to adjust my eyes to the darkness. I could feel the presence of night owls with bloated chests and long-faced coyotes stalking the wooded hillside, reminding me that despite the deed of land my parents owned, the land was never quite ours.

The moon peeked out from behind a cloud and I saw the outline of trees. Walking deeper into the woods, I saw a dead birch tree, bare of leaves, a wooden crucifix nailed to its trunk. I walked closer and closer to it, but then the honking of cars echoed from the sky. Suddenly, I found myself lying on my stomach, a window open beside me. The window was level with me, and I realized I wasn't on the mattress on my bedroom floor. I was in William's room. My laptop rested on the nightstand next to the bed. I drew in a deep breath and tried to remember how I got there.

Outside the window, I noticed a tall pillar of black smoke rising from the horizon. The black smoke carved a trail of gloom across the azure sky. I waited to hear the sirens of firetrucks, but none came.

title: Data Availability
body:
*[Initialement publié](https://medium.com/starkware/data-availability-e5564c416424) en anglais par StarkWare le 3 juin, 2020*

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MRtpLiT_R7RuJPoYwukWR.png?height=297&width=770)

**The Self-Custody Series, Part IV**

Cet article porte sur la solution de StarkEx pour la disponibilité des données (*Data Availability*), vous pourrez en apprendre plus sur les committee leurs importances et leurs responsabilités.

## Motivation

StarkEx est un moteur de scalabilité selft-custody. Il s'agit du quatrième et dernier article de notre série sur les selfs-custody, qui a décrit les différentes facettes d'un système self-custody. Cet article décrit la solution de StarkEx pour la disponibilité des données (DA) : son premier déploiement et le chemin à parcourir pour un futur de plus en plus trustless.

Pour rappel, dans StarkEx, les transactions sont regroupées, puis validées off-chain, et une preuve STARK est générée. Nous appelons ce processus une transition d'état valide. La preuve, ainsi qu'un engagement envers le nouvel état du système, sont ensuite envoyés à la blockchain, où la preuve est vérifiée et l'engagement est stocké. Les données relatives aux transactions par lots peuvent être stockées soit on-chain, soit off-chain. Avec DA on-chain, les transactions sont enregistrées en tant que données d'appel. Avec DA off-chain, les transactions sont enregistrées off-chain. DA off-chain est plus évolutive : elle consomme une quantité essentiellement fixe de ressources de la blockchain, quel que soit le volume d'activité sur StarkEx.

Le premier déploiement de StarkEx - [qui alimente l’exchange décentralisé de DeversiFi](https://medium.com/starkware/starks-over-mainnet-b83e63db04c0) - sera équipé d’une DA off-chain. DeversiFi a fait ce choix non seulement en raison de l'avantage de la scalabilité, mais aussi parce qu'il offre à ses utilisateurs une meilleure confidentialité en ce qui concerne leurs stratégies de négociation. Par conséquent, les utilisateurs qui souhaitent accéder à leur solde peuvent l'obtenir auprès des opérateurs StarkEx : l'opérateur d'application et l'opérateur de preuve (dans ce premier déploiement : DeversiFi et StarkWare, respectivement). Les utilisateurs peuvent vérifier le solde de leur compte dans un état donné avec un chemin de Merkle de leur compte dans l'arbre de Merkle jusqu'à sa racine. Notez les particularités de leur confiance dans les opérateurs : les utilisateurs n'ont pas besoin de faire confiance aux opérateurs pour savoir si l'état du système est valide, car les preuves STARKs garantissent la validité de l'état. Les utilisateurs doivent simplement faire confiance aux Opérateurs pour rendre les données disponibles.

## Le comité de disponibilité des données (DAC)

Afin de permettre aux utilisateurs de ne plus faire confiance aux opérateurs StarkEx, nous avons créé un comité de disponibilité des données (DAC). Les membres du DAC sont chargés de conserver des copies des données off-chain et de les remettre dans le domaine public en cas d'urgence. L'urgence est définie comme un scénario dans lequel les opérateurs StarkEx ne répondent pas aux demandes de retrait des utilisateurs. En cas d'urgence, le Smart Contract d'Application (ASC) n'acceptera plus les mises à jour des nouveaux états et n'autorisera que les retraits directs de fonds par des utilisateurs capables de fournir une preuve Merkle pour le dernier état.

## Responsabilités des membres du DAC

**Dans le cours normal des affaires**

* Recevoir chaque transition d'état, calculer le nouvel état et signer l'engagement envers le nouvel état.
* Conserver une copie privée et sécurisée de ces données off-chain.
  L'ASC n'acceptera une preuve STARK que si un quorum de membres du DAC a signé l'engagement sur l'état correspondant.

**En cas d'urgence**

mettre leur copie des données à la disposition du public. Les utilisateurs peuvent désormais accéder au chemin de Merkle vers leurs comptes et utiliser ce chemin pour récupérer leurs fonds directement auprès de l'ASC, sans avoir besoin de faire confiance aux opérateurs de quelque manière que ce soit.

## La voie à suivre

Nous pensons qu'il est important de minimiser la confiance dans le DAC.

Tout d'abord, nous avons l'intention de crypter les données stockées par le DAC. Cela garantira que les membres du DAC ne sont plus au courant des données relatives aux utilisateurs de StarkEx. Un tel cryptage garantit que les membres du comité ne sont pas exposés à des informations sensibles, réduisant ainsi leur responsabilité et la confiance implicite des utilisateurs envers les membres du DAC. Par conséquent, le cryptage permettra à StarkWare d'augmenter considérablement le nombre de membres du comité, et de réduire davantage la dépendance à l'égard de chaque membre individuel pour qu'il se conforme à son rôle en cas d'urgence.

Plus tard, nous mettrons en œuvre une solution entièrement trustless dans laquelle une partie intéressée pourrait totalement éliminer la confiance dans le DAC. Au lieu de cela, elle devrait investir des ressources très limitées : soit en plaçant ses propres données on-chain, soit en surveillant la progression des données off-chain (mais avec beaucoup moins de ressources que l'opérateur). Nous publierons ces idées plus en détail prochainement.

\~Tom Brand & [Uri Kolodny](https://twitter.com/ukolodny?lang=en)

## Posted on May 10 (second post)

I stretched out on the sofa, the laptop resting on my stomach. I scrolled through William's final items. They were elaborate, once again describing the details of his abundant life. The items described the lemon smell of a motel room, roaming the city streets, stopping to admire the architecture of a church, smelling the strawberries in Kensington Market.

I fought the feeling of endlessness, reading through the afternoon, aiming only to finish. I pushed through the third last item, the second last item, and then finally I was back again at the very last item I had read first, days ago.

*7:7*

*I’m sitting two table away from him. His eyes are as deep as I imagined. I challenge him to remember a phrase. Let’s see if he does.*

A cold breeze entered through the open window, and once again, I felt empty. So I scrolled back through William’s collection and started reading again from the beginning.


---
